abilityNameJapanese: 百花繚乱 大飛燕草
description: Robin creates one hundred arms that form into a giant pair of wings, capable of carrying a person through the air. The technique resembles butterfly or bird wings and provides both lift and mobility.

keyMoments.title: Robin Saves Luffy with Cien Fleur: Delphinium
keyMoments.description: Robin uses this technique to carry the immobilized Luffy off the platform and toward the sea below, protecting him from cannon fire.
keyMoments.significance: First use of this technique, demonstrating Robin's ability to rescue and protect her crewmates.

description: The manifestation of a ship's spirit, known as a Klabautermann in maritime folklore. When a ship is deeply loved and cared for, it can develop a consciousness that can repair itself, speak, and even sail independently. The Going Merry's Klabautermann appears as a childlike spirit.

keyMoments.title: Going Merry Speaks to the Crew
keyMoments.description: The Going Merry's Klabautermann speaks directly to all the Straw Hats for the first time, calling them to jump into the sea.
keyMoments.significance: First time the entire crew hears the ship's voice, confirming its sentience and spiritual presence.

keyMoments.title: Autonomous Sailing to Enies Lobby
keyMoments.description: The Going Merry sails from Water 7 to Enies Lobby completely on its own, with no crew aboard, navigating through dangerous Grand Line waters.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates the full extent of the Klabautermann's power and the ship's love for its crew.
